---
applyTo: "services-scaffold/**/*"
---
# Scaffold Templates

See [shared context](../shared/scaffold-templates.md) for file conventions.

## Quick Reference
- `env.template` → `services-enabled/<service>.env`
- `*.template` → `etc/<service>/*` (envsubst processed)
- `scaffold.yml` → Complex operations manifest
- See docs/scaffolding.md for full documentation
